vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_search(unsigned short FlibHndl, short number);

For the program number 8 digits :
FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_search(unsigned short FlibHndl, long number);

doc.cmn:
Searches the NC program registered in the program memory of CNC.
HSSB
In case of Series 15/15i, searching is delayed under the following condition.
•Edit processing on the CNC side (include background edit processing)
•downloading, verifying
In Series16/18, 16i/18i, 0i-F, 30i, Power Mate i, it is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
In Series 15i, it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
See Program number 8 digits for details.
Ethernet
It is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
In Series 15i, it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
See Program number 8 digits for details.

is.p: Searches the NC program registered in the program memory of CNC.
It is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits. See Program number 8 digits for details.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

item.name: EW_FUNC
item.content:
Unavailable
This application is not customized for the program number 8 digits.
See "Program number 8 digits" for details.

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
"OP" signal(DO) on(only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend, cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend function.
Alarm (PS000, PS101) on CNC side (except 15i, 30i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A) Reset the alarm on CNC.
CNC is in the emergency stop. (30i/31i/32i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A)

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
Program(number) is not found.

item.name: EW_PROT
item.content:
Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i, Power Mate i, PMi-A
Program is protected from editing.

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
"OP" signal(DO) on(only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend function.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
Program(number) is not found.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D/F, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

type.ul:
Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i, PMi-A 3202#0,#4,#6 (influenced by setting)
3204#3,#4 (influenced by setting)
3210,3211 (influenced by setting)
Power Mate i 3202#0,#4,#6 (influenced by setting)
3204#3,#4 (influenced by setting)

ul.li: The behavior of this function depends on the CNC mode.

cmn.p: The behavior of this function depends on the CNC mode.

(foreground search : set again selecting program.)
(background search : check whether the specified program exists or not.)
